name: NEW Gift set of 3 hooks, choose the colour combination
description:
PRICE PER GIFT SET
Make your own gift set combination mixing and matching the hooks.

Beauty meets function in these mini-canvases which decorate your walls with old fashioned landscapes and vintage embroidery inspired by a collection of much loved objects.

Handmade in chocolate creative’s studios, these hooks add a touch of vintage glamour to your home and provide essential hanging space for coats, scarves, bags and hats.

Lovingly crafted from wood, this sustainable product is finished with eco water based paint and varnish. They come ready to use with a screw fixed at the back for easy wall or shelf insertion. Depth 5.3cm Diameter 7cm. 

(updates on this products and other news at my blog: http://chocolatecreative.blogspot.com/).

options.name: Red flower, rose flower, orange flower

name: GIFT VOUCHER £60
description:
Choosing a gift for someone else? You can now get one of our gift vouchers, ranging from £30 – £60, directly from our site. 

How it works: 
Once purchased we will print and send the voucher, with an unique code to redeem it, either to you or to to the person who you are offering the present. Enter the unique code at checkout and we will send the chosen product. Vouchers may be used for any of our products available to purchase on the website, postage is charged separately.

name: Casas beech natural wood wall hooks
description:
The Casas wall hooks are lovingly crafted from beech wood. This sustainable product is finished with eco water-based paint and varnish. It comes nicely wrapped in tissue paper and packed in a brown box ready to give as a present or a treat for yourself.

W 7 cm x D 4.6 cm x H 8 cm

(updates on this products and other news at my blog: http://chocolatecreative.blogspot.com/).

name: Linen purses casas colours design
description:
Lightweight, beautiful and practical handmade natural linen purses. These versatile purses are made of hardwearing linen and are super stylish. They make the perfect gift or treat for yourself for carrying around your personal belongings or, adding a contemporary design touch to your wares.

They feature The Casas design, a new addition to my latest collections casas, a geometric design based upon my own interpretation of the traditional Spanish old houses and the hydraulic tiles. 

Colour choices: black-blue-pink, pink-grey-green, 
pink-grey-green-no outline, pink-yelow-black
Materials: Digitally printed on a mix linen/cotton fabric, inside lining made of calico, plastic white zipper
Measures: 20.5cm x 14.5cm (approx)
Care instructions: Hand wash carefully or washing machine max 30C 

Handmade with care and love in the UK

name: LINEN TOTE BAG casas design
description:
Lightweight, beautiful and practical handmade natural linen tote bags. These versatile bags are made of hardwearing linen and are super stylish. They make the perfect gift or treat for yourself for carrying around your personal belongings or, adding a contemporary design touch to your wares.

They have a simple design, featuring the Casas pattern, that will last trends and will complement well your every day outfits. They have enough room to fit the laptop, iPad, books, groceries, etc…they have a pocket inside and the interior is made of calico. 

Colour choices/measures: 
brown background black outline 37m x 36cm (approx) 34 long strap
white background black outline 40cm x 42cm (approx) 34 long strap
Materials: Digitally printed on a mix linen/cotton fabric, inside lining made of calico
Care instructions: Hand wash carefully or washing machine max 30C 

Handmade with care and love in the UK

Why not match the linen bags with one of the purses

name: pink-grey casas cushion
description:
The casas cushions is a new addition to my latest collections casas, a geometric design based upon my own interpretation of the traditional Spanish old houses and the hydraulic tiles. Perfect for snugging up, adding a contemporary design touch to your home. 

– Colour choices: Black, olive green or blue
– Materials: Front panel, digitally printed on a mix of cotton and linen, and back panel on plain linen
– Measures: 50cm (approx)
– Made in the UK
– Machine washable, mac 40C

Due to size regulation restrictions when shipping outside the UK, We can only send the outer cover of this cushion. The outer cover fits a standard 50cm inside padding.

– Materials: Handprinted on 100% Union linen, 
(56% linen/46%cotton) using water based inks
– Measures: 73cm x 51cm (approx)
– Made in the UK
– Machine washable, mac 40C

description:
Keep your desk organised and bring some playfuness and beauty to your work space with the new beech wood office range. 

The Casas pencil holder is lovingly crafted from beech wood. This sustainable product is finished with eco water-based paint and varnish. It comes nicely wrapped in tissue paper and packed in a brown box ready to give as a present or a treat for yourself.

name: Red lake English Romantic cushion
description:
The romance and beauty of the English countryside are the inspiration for chocolate creative’s new English Romantic Collection.
Beauty meets function in these mini-canvases which decorate your homes with old fashioned landscapes inspired by a collection of much loved old paintings and images. Handmade in chocolate creative’s studios, these cushions add a touch of vintage glamour to your home and provide the essential comfort to any sofa or bed.
These cushion collection complement very well some of the hooks and knobs designs, browse the many colours and designs to find the perfect match to each of the cushions. 

Lovingly crafted from natural linens, the pattern in the front is digitally printed, and the back is made of natural plain linen. This sustainable product is handmade in the UK. 

Size: 45 wide x 30 height cm
Material: 100% natural linen
Padding: Good quality feather
Style: Zip 
Care: Hand wash carefully or dry cleaning only

Be aware that the hand made collections are hand made individually and because of the nature of the process, colors and pattern may vary from cushion to cushion. We do our best to match the photos with the original products, but please take in consideration that due to individual color screens settings, colors may look slightly different to the real product.

name: Handmade cushion on Eco 100% Hemp – Love message
description: FREE SHIPPING Handmade cushion, hand printed and embroidered on sustainable fabrics. Each cushion is individually done, so designs and colors may change from one to another. Ideas behind the collection are based on creating individual messages from familiar packaging such as coffee sacks. Size: 50x50 cm/(19.5x19.5 inches) Material: 100% Eco hemp Padding: feather Zip style Care: Hand washing carefully Handmade in the UK Due to size regulation restrictions when shipping outside the UK, We can only send the outer cover of this cushion.

name: Handmade cushion on natural linen – deer cameo
description:
This handmade cushion has been hand printed and embroidery on sustainable fabrics, such as organic cotton. Ideas behind the collection are based on the concept and look of Victorian cameos.

Size: 40x40 cm/(16x16 inches)
Material: 100% organic cotton and 100% linen
Padding: feather
Envelop style
Handmade in the UK

name: NEW Handmade cushion in natural fabrics – Butterflies grey cameo
description:
This handmade cushion has been hand printed with water-based inks on sustainable fabrics, such as organic cotton, hemp and natural linen. The Cameos collection takes the inspiration from one of my visits to the V&A Museum in London, where I got inspired by the Victorian silhouettes and cameos of that period, and my fascination for nature. The deer cameo has been a bestseller since the beginning, so I am adding this new design and colour to the already popular collection.

Size: 50x50 cm
Material: 100% organic cotton, and natural linens  
Padding: feather
 Zip style and back in red and white cotton 
 Handmade in the UK  
Care: hand wash carefully or dry clean

name: NEW Handmade cushion on natural fabrics – Yellow deer cameo
description:
This handmade cushion has been hand printed with water based inks on sustainable fabrics, such as organic cotton, hemp and natural linen. The rose is a heat transfer appliqué. The Cameos collection takes the inspiration from one of my visits to the V&A Museum in London, where I got inspired by the Victorian silhouettes and cameos of that period, and my fascination for deer. The deer cameo has been a bestseller since the beginning, so I am adding this new colors in bigger sizes to the already popular collection.

Size: 45x45 cm 
Material: 100% organic cotton, hemp and natural linens 
Padding: feather   
Zip style and back in natural plain linen 
Handmade in the UK 
Care: hand wash carefully or dry clean, iron inside out and never over the rose appliqué.

name: Handmade cushion on natural fabrics – green deer cameo
description:
This handmade cushion, has been hand printed with water based inks on sustainable fabrics, such as organic cotton, hemp and natural linen. The rose is a heat transfer appliqué. The Cameos collection takes the inspiration from one of my visits to the V&A Museum in London, where I got inspired by the Victorian silhouettes and cameos of that period, and my fascination for deer. The deer cameos has been a best seller since the beginning, so I am adding this new colors in bigger sizes to the already popular collection.

Size: 45x45 cm 
Material: 100% organic cotton, hemp and natural linens 
Padding: feather   
Zip style and back in natural plain linen 
Handmade in the UK 
Care: hand wash carefully or dry cleaning, iron inside out and never over the rose appliqué.

name: XMAS vintage card
description:
A new Xmas design perfect to complement this season home's decoration, inspired on a vintage cards game, found in an antique shop in Norwich, England. 

Size: 30x30 cm/(12x12 inches)
 Material: Natural linen and red Gingham cotton fabric
 Padding: 100% duck feather  
Envelop Style
Care: hand wash carefully
Handmade in the UK

name: Handmade Christmas decorations
description:
These Christmas decorations have been made by my mother and me, at my home/studio in London. They are made of natural linens.
There 4 different designs to choose from, Noel, Joy, Trees and deer. They come nicely wrapped and with a gift tag ready to be given to your loved ones or as a treat for your home. 

* Limited stock, while it last.

name: Hand printed deer cameo print
description:
Original deer cameos design screen printed on 200gsm, 100% recycled Italian Fabriano paper using waterbased inks. Handprinetd by me at my studio in South London. Each print is signed.
Colour: black
Size: 30x40cm

Sold unframed but it will fit many standard high street frames. 
The print will be rolled and packaged in a strong postal tube.

name: Organic cotton tote bags, deer cameo, pink sofa and love mesage
description:
Add some glamour to your shopping with these eco tote bags. 3 design to choose from the Deer cameo, Love message and pink sofa Hand printed on 100% natural cotton, 38cm(w) x 43cm(h) with short handles. Each bag is individually done, so designs and colors may change from one to another. They come already wrapped with its own gift tag. 

Untreated natural fibres are great for our environment, but unsuitable for washing at high temperatures, so please only wash on a warm or cool wash by hand or machine.

name: Blue natural linen tote bag
description:
Lightweight, beautiful and practical handmade natural linen tote bag. These versatile tote bags are made of hardwearing linen and are super stylish. They make the perfect gift or treat for yourself. 

They have a simple design that will last trends and will complement well your every day outfits. They have enough room to fit the laptop, books, groceries, etc…the have a pocket on the front side and the interior is made of calico. The back of the bag features a small handmade label.

Size: 39cm wide by 45cm long, strap size: 43 long
Materials: Natural linens and calico
Care instructions: Hand wash carefully or washing machine max 30C 
Handmade in the UK by my mother and I in my studio in South London.

name: Natural Linen purses
description:
Lightweight, beautiful and practical handmade natural linen purses. These versatile purses are made of hardwearing linen and are super stylish. They make the perfect gift or treat for yourself. 

They have a simple design that will last trends, you can choose from five different fabrics. They have enough room to fit your pencils, pens, mobile, make up, etc…the interior is made of calico. The front of the purse features a small handmade label and a red zip.

Size: 21 cm wide by 15cm long
Materials: Natural linens and calico
Care instructions: Hand wash carefully or washing machine max 30C 
Handmade in the UK by my mother and I in my studio in South London.

name: KNOBS metal colours & black and white
description:
PRICE PER UNIT

NEW wooden knob colours.
Revamp a chest of drawers and add a playful aspect to your interior with these practical and fun accessories. Handmade in chocolate creative’s studios these knobs can update your furniture or add a personal touch to your newly bought cabinets or drawers.

They come in a range of colours including minimalist black & white, silver, gold and copper metal. They are great for current colour-blocking trends teaming up wonderfully with neutral colours such as greys and natural woods. Alternatively go for knobs decorated with old fashioned landscapes and vintage embroidery inspired by a collection of much loved objects.

Lovingly crafted from plywood, this sustainable product is finished with eco water based paint and varnish. They come ready to use with a 4.5cm bolt that can be easily cut to the required length. Depth 5cm Diameter 5cm. Price £9 each.

(updates on this products and other news at my blog: http://chocolatecreative.blogspot.com/).

description:

Alternatively go for hooks decorated with old fashioned landscapes and vintage embroidery inspired by a collection of much loved objects.

They are great for current colour-blocking trends teaming up wonderfully with neutral colours such as greys and natural woods. Alternatively go for knobs decorated with old fashioned landscapes and vintage embroidery inspired by a collection of much loved objects.

Lovingly crafted from plywood, this sustainable product is finished with eco water based paint and varnish. They come ready to use with a 4.5cm bolt that can be easily cut to the required length. Depth 5cm Diameter 5cm. Price £9 each.

(updates on this products and other news at my blog: http://chocolatecreative.blogspot.com/).

name: HOOKS English Romantic collection
description:
PRICE PER UNIT
The romance and beauty of the English countryside are the inspiration for chocolate creative’s new English Romantic Collection. 

Beauty meets function in these mini-canvases which decorate your walls with old fashioned landscapes and vintage embroidery inspired by a collection of much loved objects.

Handmade in chocolate creative’s studios, these hooks add a touch of vintage glamour to your home and provide essential hanging space for coats, scarves, bags and hats.

Lovingly crafted from wood , this sustainable product is finished with eco water based paint and varnish. They come ready to use with a screw fixed at the back for easy wall or shelf insertion. Depth 5.3cm Diameter 7cm. Price £15

(updates on this products and other news at my blog: http://chocolatecreative.blogspot.com/).

name: KNOBS plain colours
description:
PRICE PER UNIT

Add a splash of colour with chocolate creative’s NEW wooden knobs
Revamp a chest of drawers and add a playful aspect to your interior with these practical and fun accessories. Handmade in chocolate creative’s studios these knobs can update your furniture or add a personal touch to your newly bought cabinets or drawers. 

They come in a range of colours including happy yellow, romantic pink, vintage red, and a calming turquoise blue. They are great for current colour-blocking trends teaming up wonderfully with neutral colours such as greys and natural woods. Alternatively go for knobs decorated with old fashioned landscapes and vintage embroidery inspired by a collection of much loved objects.

Lovingly crafted from plywood, this sustainable product is finished with eco water based paint and varnish. They come ready to use with a 4.5cm bolt that can be easily cut to the required length. Depth 5cm Diameter 5cm. Price £9 each.

name: Handmade cushion on natural fabrics – pink deer cameo
description:
This handmade cushion, has been hand printed with water based inks on sustainable fabrics, such as organic cotton, hemp and natural linen. The rose is a heat transfer appliqué. The Cameos collection takes the inspiration from one of my visits to the V&A Museum in London, where I got inspired by the Victorian silhouettes and cameos of that period, and my fascination for deer. The deer cameos has been a best seller since the beginning, so I am adding this new colors in bigger sizes to the already popular collection.

Size: 45x45 cm 
Material: 100% organic cotton, hemp and natural linens 
Padding: feather   
Zip style and back in natural plain linen 
Handmade in the UK 
Care: hand wash carefully or dry cleaning, iron inside out and never over the rose appliqué.

description:

and vintage damask cotton

name: Hand printed chandelier print
description:
This Chandelier design is part on my hand drawings for the Decayed Glamour collection. 

Original Chandelier design screen printed on 200gsm, 100% recycled Italian Fabriano paper using waterbased inks. Hand printed by me at my studio in South London. Each print is signed and dated.
Colour: black
Size: 30x40cm

Sold unframed but it will fit many standard high street frames. 
The print will be rolled and packaged in a strong postal tube.

name: Hand printed Chesterfield print
description:
This chesterfield design is part on my hand drawings for the Decayed Glamour collection. There are two versions to choose from, the black outline or with the damask pattern in yellow.

Original Chesterfield design screen printed on 200gsm, 100% recycled Italian Fabriano paper using waterbased inks. Handprinetd by me at my studio in South London. Each print is signed on the back.
Colour: black
Size: 30x40cm

Sold unframed but it will fit many standard high street frames. 
The print will be rolled and packaged in a strong postal tube.

name: Bone china mug Decayed Glamour Collection – Yellow Damask Design
description:
This bone china mug features one of my original hand drawings from the Decayed Glamour collection, a damask drawing in yellow. It makes the perfect gift or treat for yourself. Add some glamour to your tea time! 

It is decorated by hand in the UK, 
dishwasher and microwave safe bone china mug.

Dimension are: height 8.5cm by diameter 7.3cm
Comes wrapped in tissue and boxed for posting.

This design is part of the Decayed glamour collection, they are 4 different designs, chandelier, mirror and damask in pink and yellow, they complement each other very well.

name: Bone china mug Cameos collection – Deer Design
description:
This bone china mug features one of my original hand drawings from the Cameos collection. It makes the perfect gift or treat for yourself. Add some glamour to your tea time!

It is hand decorated Stoke on Trent, UK, 
dishwasher and microwave safe bone china mug.

New bigger size: height 9cm by diameter 8.5cm 
Comes wrapped in tissue and boxed for posting.

description:

safe bone china mug.

name: Bone china mug, Message Collection – Love Message Design
description:
Looking for the perfect Valentine’s gift? This bone china mug featuring one of my original hand drawings for the LOVE messages collection, makes the prefect gift or treat for yourself, Add some LOVE to your tea time! 

It is decorated by hand in the UK, dishwasher and microwave safe bone china mug.
Dimension are: height 8.5cm by diameter 7.3cm.
Comes wrapped in tissue and boxed for posting.

name: Hand printed Love Message print
description:
Original love message design screenprinted on 300gsm, 100% recycled Italian Fabriano paper using water based inks. Hand printed by me at my studio in South London. Each print is signed and dated.
Colour: black, red
Size: 40x50cm

Sold unframed but it will fit many standard high street frames. 
The print will be rolled and packaged in a strong postal tube.

name: Handmade tea towel – love message
description:
Treat your love ones with this present or give your kitchen a bit of love with this beautiful hand printed Linen union tea towel.

Colors: white
Size: 48x78 cm/(19x31 inches)
Material: Linen union, a 54% linen/46% cotton mix.

name: Handmade cushion on natural linen – Brown English Roses
description:
This handmade cushion has been hand printed on sustainable fabrics such as 100% linen. English Roses, is the new Summer design on natural linens, with roses appliqués inspired by the English roses and countryside. This handmade design is the perfect complement to create a warm and effortless atmosphere to welcome the sunny season.

Size: Size: 40x40 cm/(16x16 inches)
Material: 100% natural linen
Padding: Feather
Style: Envelope 
Care: Hand wash carefully, don’t iron over the roses pattern.
Handmade in the UK

name: Blank Greeting Cards
description:
Blank cards, perfect for hand written and thanks notes. The cards come as 5 different designs based on some of my hand drawings and collections. Printed on white paper stock, they come with white envelopes. 

These are cards that will never be thrown away as they are ideal for framing.

Designs are: Love message, Deer cameos, Pink sofa, Yellow chair and Chandelier design.

name: Handmade cushion on organic cotton – Leni vintage paper doll
description:
Add a bit of nostalgia to your life with this vintage paper doll cushion, digitally heat pressed on 100% organic cotton. Images color and designs may change from cushion to cushion as they are manually cut and ironed on the fabric. The perfect look for the vintage revival.

Size: 43x33 cm 
Padding: Feather 
Style: Envelope 
Care: Dry clean only, iron inside out and never over the patterns.
Made in the UK

description:
This handmade cushion is the perfect complement to the red heart stitch design. They are made on red Gingham cotton fabric, and blue and natural linen. 

Size: 30x30 cm/(12x12 inches) 
Material: Red Gingham cotton fabric, and blue and natural linen 
Padding: Feather 
Envelop Style
Care: Hand wash carefully

description:

name: Hand cross stitch on natural linen  – Red Heart Design
description:
This handmade cushion has been hand embroidery on sustainable fabrics such as natural linens. This beautiful hand stitched design is my tribute to all the women around the world that has passed the cross stitch tradition from generations to generations. Like my mother did with my sister and me. The choice of natural fabrics such as 100% natural linen and 100% gingham cotton are the perfect match for this red heart design.

Colors: Red
Size: 30x30 cm/(12x12 inches)
Material: 100% natural linen and red Gingham cotton fabric
Padding: feather
Envelop style
Care: Hand wash carefully
Made in the UK

name: Handmade cushion on natural linen and cotton – Charlie loves his bone
description:
Charlie lives and work in a famous Russian circus that tours the world. He loves entertaining, making new friends, sleeping, and above all eating!!

He came from a great vintage toys collection that Tracy and Jesper, from boboho.com have been collecting over the years, and so kindly photographed for my new Circus collection.
 
This cushion is made of natural linen using image transfer paper and it is finished with a hand cross-stitched heart design.

Size: 30x30 cm/(12x12 inches) 
Material: Natural linen and red Gingham cotton fabrics. 
Padding: Feather 
Envelop Style
Care: Hand washing carefully, don’t iron over the pattern.
Handmade in the UK.

name: Handmade cushion on natural linen an cotton – tops and tails in the circus
description:

Size: 30x30 cm/(12x12 inches)
Material: Natural linen and red Gingham cotton fabric
 Padding: 100% duck feather   
Envelop Style
